column4: I have a complete newb question, my system menu is missing when i installed ubuntu
on the right side under your name
indeed, I forgot to ask you what flavor you are using
Under My Name > switch user account, my name, online accounts, user accounts
yes, but: the standard one with the launcher on the left side or the one with the panel at the top?
ok, on the ricgt side (beside your name) are "gears", click there
yeah.. but the system menu isn't there
I thought is is there by default, just wanted to show you how it looks
and I cannot right click the panel?
yeah the panel is only for notifications nowadays...
